root: ^There are some that say showing care and kindness to the patrons is more important than the food itself.
^I am made from stars, galaxies, and raw galactic energy.
^In theorum, everything has a path. A destiny, woven into the fabric of space and time.
^I can feel the weight of the universe shift with every action you make here in the Diner.
^You have shown to possess some sort of unknown ability.
^An unknown ability? I was just trying to do my job...
^You have gone beyond that. You have altered the destiny of a variety of different beings, far beyond what their intended path was meant to be.
^I'm confused, what are you trying to say?
^Seeing your potential has made me recognize my own potential as well.
^(As if instinctual, I clasp O'Ryan's hand.)
^(In an instant, I feel as if all of the knowledge in the universe is being poured into my brain all at once.)
